casebody.data:
[Cite as 09/02/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-0hio-4591.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

September 2, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002- 1575. Barnhill v. Hamilton.

Butler App. No. CA2002-03-052. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Butler County.

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that oral argument scheduled for October 7, 2003, be, and hereby is, canceled.

Pfeifer, J., dissents.
